value:
This place is amazing. Even the air—
it's so, I don't know...fresh? We must
be really high up or something!

I'm not too happy being in battles, but
I'm glad to help any way I can. You
know what I do love doing?$k$pCleaning and doing laundry,
believe it or not!

You should sit down and relax
for a while, $Nu.$k$pI'll get you some water.

Oh, Father... Mother... And my
brother...

The wind can really pick up around
here—and that can blow all of my
laundry right off the line!

Hi there! Oh, wait.... Right! I'm here
mainly to pass on a hello from
$Nf!

Getting stronger! Only figures.
I am my father's daughter!

Looks like I'm getting a bit
better at all of this!

See? I'm just not meant to be
out here in battle!

Nice you did that, but I hope you
don't have better things to do.

Hi! I'm Mist. But where am I? This
all happened so fast! Well, I bet
you'll help me get settled in, right?

Oh, $Nu!$k$pYou caught me in the middle of
working on laundry. It's something
that really helps me relax.$k$pYou know I'm not that comfortable
being in the middle of battles, but
I do like helping everyone.$k$pI've come to love being here with so
many people. You must have seen
that I was nervous at first.$k$pSome of the Heroes seemed a bit
intimidating! But I knew I could
trust you from the very start.$k$pI don't really know why, but I knew it
from the second I saw you. Anyway,
I've been glad to work hard for you.$k$pSo, right... What was my point? Oh,
yes. Thanks! And you can count on
me to keep doing my best!
Do you know my brother? He can be...a bit of an odd one.
Always glad when you have time for me. Thank you so much!
You know I will never forgive you if you—you know—die on me. Please remember that.
